Articles.Content:
This challenge is based off an idea I had and I wondered if it was possible. It's obviously possible, but I lack skills. So here's the challenge:

  • NORMAL MODE: Start up a Career game, then go to either the VAB or SPH, and with ONLY the beginning (Tier 1) parts, make a vessel and fly it to Duna.
  • EXPERT MODE: Same, but fly the rocket to Laythe.

Good luck and have fun!

P.S. videos pls

EDIT: After realizing what the tier 1 parts really are, I've made the challenge do it with tiers 1 and 2.

Edited February 3, 2019 by millionmax
too hard
